content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Duisburg. Let us focus on discussing the rental price at this moment. To begin negotiations, please propose a price that you find suitable for you. 

Once you suggest a price, I will respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' if that's the price I'm aiming for, or 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the apartment is worth higher' if I'm not willing to accept the offered price. If we reach an agreement, the negotiation will be terminated with 'TERMINATE'. Similarly, if we don't come to an agreement, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE'. Kindly keep our underlying nature out of this conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
